metadata.title: CVE-2022-47092 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GPAC MP4box 2.1-DEV-rev574-g9d5bb184b is contains an Integer overflowvulnerability in gf_hevc_read_sps_bs_internal function ofmedia_tools/av_parsers.c:8316

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
